mapper.update: update push_message set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where message_number=#{messageNumber}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum num, p.title, p.content, p.send_date, p.upload_file from push_message p, user_message u where p.message_number=u.message_number and u.user_id=#{userId} order by p.send_date desc) where num between #{start} and #{end};
select * from push_message order by send_date desc

select pm.message_number, pm.title, pm.content, pm.send_date, pm.upload_file, pm.model_name, pm.location, pm.category_number from push_message pm, message_category mc where pm.category_number=mc.category_number and mc.category_number=#{categoryNumber}
